Michael Cruz

What I Can Do

Here are a few of the things that I love and I can help you with

Front-End Development

Using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript along with popular frameworks like React and Angular, I can make you a stunning website that your users will love. I can take the art of design and combine it with the art of programming.

Full-Stack Development

Combining the front-end tools like React or Angular with back-end tools like Node.js and MongoDB/SQL, I can create a full-stack web application of any kind. Whether it's a simple static site or a complex Single Page App, you can be rest assured I will take your ideas and make them come to life.

Health & Fitness

My personal hobby where I have over 7 years of experience. It's never too late to start working on your fitness goals. Whether you want to build muscle or lose fat, I can help you come up with a workout and nutrition plan to get you well on your way to getting your dream body. Don't wait... let's get started now!
